smarty.errors module¶

Provides basic errors handling.

smarty.errors.assertion(condition, mess='')[source]¶

If condition is False, raises an AssertionError with message and exits a program.

Parameters:

  • condition – condition to evaluate

  • mess (str) – message that is raised by an AssertionError
